name: You Suck! Button
description:
*** FREE for a very limited amount of time. Only the next certain amount of downloads will be given at no cost :) ***

For those times that just the ANNOY the heck out of you...let everyone know that they SUCK!!

The You Suck Button comes with multiple high fidelity sounds, with the hilarity you would only expect from RFAMapps. Features include:

*"You Suck!"

*"Loosserr"

*"Reeejected!"

*"You Win!....NOT"

*"Booo"

*"Go Home!"

*"Are You SERIOUS?!"

*"NNNot Even Close!"

* Last minute update: you can now shake your iPhone/iPod Touch to play the sounds

The You Suck Button is the perfect compliment to all those SUCKY moments in life.


*****FOR MORE BUTTONS*****
Consider the All Big Buttons app, which includes all the sounds and graphics from your favorite button kits, including You Suck, What The Bleep, PWNED, and more! All future buttons will be included in free upgrades of All Big Buttons. Have the convenience of one app holding all your favorite quirky sounds.

See it at: http://allbigbuttons.rfamgroup.com
